title: Vzhled dlaždic zkratek na novém panelu
content:
Dobrý den,

při otevírání nového panelu často používám zkratky, kterých mám 4 řady. Dříve měly dlaždice zkratek vzhled faviconu nebo "nějakého loga" stránky, na kterou odkazovaly. Dnes se mi v dlaždicích většinou zobrazují jen počáteční písmena odkazu. Jen výjimečně je tam nějaký související vzhled a to ne po celé ploše dlaždice ale pouze jako mrňavá ikonka uprostřed. Když chci v dlaždici nastavit vlastní obrázek, zadám adresu, v náhledu se mi zobrazí náhled stránky (většinou jde o nějaký výřez, ne favicon), ovšem po uložení zůstane dlaždice prázdná.

Tuším, že někde do verze Firefoxu 7x měly dlaždice po celé ploše favicon stránky na kterou odkazovaly. Bylo to perfektně přehledné.

Nevíte, jak se k tomuto stylu vrátit? Downgrade Firefoxu za mě není řešení.

Díky za všechny reakce.
creator: jiri.sramek

title: Login to server smtp.office365.com with username darlene@lostvalley.movie failed.
content:
I have two email address for @lostvalley.movie on Office365 through Go Daddy. One works fine but the other has authentication error. I receive fine but can't send.

The settings all match.

I tried all fixes mentioned from other users but no go.
creator: kentipton

title: Bookmarks - copies of folders
content: Firefox creates copies of bookmark folders, e.g there were 72 folders called Other Bookmarks. They seemed to all be copies of one of two folders. Searching bookmarks takes too long to do. And it takes quite a time to delete these copies. And if I do delete them all, will new ones be created? What causes these copies to be created?
creator: petermheffernan

title: Lost Passwords
content:
Ubuntu 22... Firefox was frozen, i closed it. couldnt open it again. Restarted pc.. kys.db last edited by firefox 1 week ago. I lost all my passwords, bookmarks, places... Files are changed 1 week ago.. No copies on mozilla folder... No fucking nothins... There is no copy of them, i changed it 3 days ago and Fx crashed...

Some companies gonna ask me for my personal id, finger print and photos.... Are you fucking serios? Where are my passwords?

I need them, now!
creator: SonDevrim

title: I'm refusing to install the latest update due to the problems the last update created.  Does anyone know if the problems from the last update have been fixed?
content: I had all kinds of problems with the forced changes to the Firefox screen in the prior update. (I have vision issues and I had everything working for me, then without any warning, I couldn't hardly even use Firefox.) After wasting a ton of time, I was able to get something working, but not as well. Now, there's a new update, and I don't want to install it unless there's a guarantee that it won't do unwanted changes, or at least give me the option to revert to my existing version if the new version doesn't work for me. Does anyone know if the problems caused in the last update have been fixed and what might be in the current update?
creator: livingsed

title: Websites via Firefox browser think 2018 Imac desktop new device & always require verification
content: How do I make it stop requiring verification of a device I've been using for 5 years? I prefer Firefox to Safari in all other ways, but this is a time consuming repetitive problem.

title: Firefox processes
content: After seeing dozens of Firefox processes idle but taking up memory, I reinstalled the browser. I found the issue was still unresolved so I looked into it more carefully. When I startup and shutdown Firefox, there are 6 processes, which I read was normal. However, it adds 5 more processes each time I startup and shutdown the browser. I do not want to leave the browser up all day and I let my computer sleep rather than shutdown each night. I reboot after updates etc. The processes disappear on restart/reboot. WIN 11 Pro 64 bit.
creator: jmlutz01
